CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(TotalGrossCostNmb__c) && ErrorMessageTxt__c = NULL, IMAGE("/img/samples/rating3.gif", "Em Processamento", 16, 16), IF(ErrorMessageTxt__c = NULL, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "OK", 16,16), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", ErrorMessageTxt__c, 16,16)))
CustomField.label: Flag Erro no Item
